name: Conspiracy Board
description:
Ever wanted to feel like a super sleuth behind that keyboard of yours?


Tired of your whiteboards being soâ€¦white? Maybe you're looking to add a noir twist to your org chart, journey map, or family reunion invitation? Something that'll grab everyone's attention, possibly for all the wrong reasons?


Conspiracy Board has you covered.


Complete with a demo board, a couple example use cases, and a board full of components for you to pick apart and use any way you see fit, this file's got everything except the briefcase and handcuffs. You'll have to provide those yourself.


Just don't blame me if you walk away from your project believing in some ridiculous connection between aliens and Bill Gates' unicorn farm. I mean yeah, they're both real, but they're completely separate things.


Hot tip: this file is best used while listening to the Hotline Miami soundtrack.
